episode.title: Paper Floor Mats
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Christina Warren returns to the show to discuss Apple’s controversial child safety initiatives, the tumultuous summer of Safari 15 beta UI designs, and a bit more on MagSafe battery packs.
